channel.title: Where would I add this exactly XD
channel.description:
[code]int refreshHighscores = 0; server.HighScores.refreshHighscores(); while(!server.shutdownServer) { refreshHighscores++; if (refreshHighscores == 120 ) { server.HighScores.refreshHighscores(); refreshHighscores = 0; } }[/code]
I have never had to add a int, no clue where it goes.

item.title: Where would I add this exactly XD
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

I think I know what to do, one sec.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2008, 04:30:26 PM[/size][hr]If you have a java or class file named HighScores, then follow the instructions below. If you don’t, find a HighScore’s handler either on Mopar, sythe, fagex, or google. And don’t do any of the following until you do find one.

Step 1:

Open up server.java and search for:

npcHandler = new NPCHandler();

Above or below that add this:

HighScores = new HighScores();

As for the rest of the integers and so forth, I have have no clue. lol. I would have to have a highscores handler myself to look at, but I don’t have time.

Read full topic
item.source: Where would I add this exactly XD
